channel.title: Runescape Remake ll BETA ll OPENING Today!
channel.description:
[size=24pt][center][url=http://freveascape.com]Official Website[/url][/center][/size]
[center]Opening Date: 1/27/13[/center]
[center]We plan to be released today! So register on our site & introduce yourself! Always happy to see new people in the community![/center]
[center]Experience Rate: Our remake is different in 1 way, the the XP Rate. 1.5 xp per hit meaning not so fast you get level 99 in a few days but not so slow that you just decide to give up on life.[/center]
[center]Features: Skills: > Flawless Combat System (Ranging, Magic, Melee) > Firemaking 100% (Dropping logs then Lighting em on fire, Cant light on top of other fires, Clipped) > Woodcutting (No Cutting from far away, Nests, etc) > Fishing (All fishing spots and All fishes) > Crafting (Gem Cutting/Crafting, Pottery, Tanning, Weaving, Leather Making, Spinning, Glass Blowing/Making, Hard Leather, SnakeSking, Dragon Skin) > Cooking (Brews, Dairy, Wine etc.) > Fletching (Normal Logs, Oak etc.., Arrow Making, Bow Stringing) > Mining (Mine Essence, Mine Ore) > Herblore (Cleaning, Grinding, Poison Making, Potion Making) > Thieving (Stalls, NPCs, Attacked when stealing from Stall) > Slayer > Smithing (Smelting) > Farming (Allotments, Bushes, Compost, Fruit Trees, Tool Leprechaun, Seedling, Mithril seeds, Etc.)[/center]
[center]Rnadom Events:
Random events still need to be added & will come soon in time.[/center]
Things That Need To Be Added: > Barrows > Castle Wars > Gnome Ball (Unfinished) > Mage Training Arena (Unfinished) > Fight Caves > Gnome Glider > Magic Carpet > Sailing > Jewellery Teleports (Glory amulet)
Pictures:
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/33bir8i.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/j94h7q.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/i1xl4x.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2qis378.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/1z1bx1d.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2qmp7yg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2dir0o7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/25f3uz5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/4q3msy.png[/img]

item.title: Runescape Remake ll BETA ll OPENING Today!
item.dc:creator: @frevea frevea
item.description:
@frevea wrote:

[size=24pt][center]Official Website[/center][/size]

[center]Opening Date: 1/27/13[/center]

[center]We plan to be released today! So register on our site & introduce yourself! Always happy to see new people in the community![/center]

[center]Experience Rate:
Our remake is different in 1 way, the the XP Rate. 1.5 xp per hit meaning not so fast you get level 99 in a few days but not so slow that you just decide to give up on life.[/center]

[center]Features:
Skills:

Flawless Combat System (Ranging, Magic, Melee)
Firemaking 100% (Dropping logs then Lighting em on fire, Cant light on top of other fires, Clipped)
Woodcutting (No Cutting from far away, Nests, etc)
Fishing (All fishing spots and All fishes)
Crafting (Gem Cutting/Crafting, Pottery, Tanning, Weaving, Leather Making, Spinning, Glass Blowing/Making, Hard Leather, SnakeSking, Dragon Skin)
Cooking (Brews, Dairy, Wine etc.)
Fletching (Normal Logs, Oak etc…, Arrow Making, Bow Stringing)
Mining (Mine Essence, Mine Ore)
Herblore (Cleaning, Grinding, Poison Making, Potion Making)
Thieving (Stalls, NPCs, Attacked when stealing from Stall)
Slayer
Smithing (Smelting)
Farming (Allotments, Bushes, Compost, Fruit Trees, Tool Leprechaun, Seedling, Mithril seeds, Etc.)[/center]

[center]Rnadom Events:

Random events still need to be added & will come soon in time.[/center]

Things That Need To Be Added:

Barrows
Castle Wars
Gnome Ball (Unfinished)
Mage Training Arena (Unfinished)
Fight Caves
Gnome Glider
Magic Carpet
Sailing
Jewellery Teleports (Glory amulet)
